title: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not function unless I first click on one of the 'live' areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000 on March 26, 2002, the tab key does not work as expected.
EB: When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000 on March 26, 2002, the tab key should move the focus to the next focusable element.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Go to the Help view.
3. Attempt to use the tab key without clicking on any 'live' areas.
4. Observe that the tab key does not work.
5. Click on one of the 'live' areas.
6. Try to use the tab key again.
7. Observe that the tab key now works and moves the focus to the next focusable element.
